comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called freightyards, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 7211509@N04
comment._content: In the 40's and into the 50's-'60's, these freightyards were central to most Texas cities of any size.  The railroad tracks used to cross the streets and tie up traffic before freeways were built.
